user.title: Connect to your Niko Connected Controller II
user.description:
Configuring controller **{host}**.

There are 2 ways to authenticate:
1. Activate the 'Niko Hobby API' on the [Connected Services page](https://mynikohomecontrol.niko.eu/nlbe/ConnectedServices/Overview).
2. Use a touchscreen profile.

'Niko Hobby API' is the easiest method, but you will need to reauthenticate once a year. Touchscreen profiles can be created in the 'Niko Home Control programming software' under Dashboard â†’ Touchscreens.
